Ụtụ isi maka osisi bụ ụtụ isi nke gọọmentị Joseph Stalin nyere ndị nwe osisi mkpụrụ osisi na USSR na 1944. Ụtụ isi ahụ mere ka ọ dị oke ọnụ inwe osisi n'ugbo, ma nwee nsonaazụ a na-atụghị anya ya nke na-akpata ọtụtụ osisi site n'aka ndị ọrụ ugbo Soviet
Nke a mechara mee ka ụkọ mkpụrụ osisi.
Onye Minista Arseny Zverev tụpụtara echiche a, Stalin atụghị anya nsogbu ndị ọ ga-eweta
Georgy Malenkov kagburu ụtụ isi ahụ na 1954, mgbe e belatara ụtụ isi site na pasent 60 maka ndị ọrụ ugbo..
